verbs.description: For [V: die] - [ARG2: hard] State of Jefferson activists , the dream of a 51st state lives on , with much hope in the Trump administration .
[ARGM-GOL: For die - hard State of Jefferson activists] , [ARG1: the dream of a 51st state] [V: lives] on , [ARGM-MNR: with much hope in the Trump administration] .
